pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.1_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.2_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.11:2.1_0: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr1.11:2.2_0: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajati—
